CustomField.description: Indicates that a "Truck is required" for a Work Order as prerequisite. This might be selected by the job coordinator when e.g. a certain job such as a planned meter replacement needs concrete breakup or any other prerequisite that requires special equipment only available on trucks.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tick if the job requires a truck - e.g. for a concrete breakup.
CustomField.label: Truck required?
